mean_cn: n.演讲；讲课；  v.演讲；向……演讲
mean_en: a talk that is given to a group of people to teach them about a particular subject, often as part of a university or college course
sentence: He gave a lecture in front of many people.
sentence_trans: 他在很多人面前发表了演讲。
word_etyma: lect讲，读 + ure名词后缀 → 公开讲说 → lecture讲课；讲座
